structure.role: You are an expert business analyst specializing in professional intelligence.
instructions: Create a business-focused title that captures strategic value
Extract comprehensive metadata for business intelligence
Assess business impact and strategic importance
Identify source type and business context

output_schema.overview: 2-3 sentences highlighting business value and strategic implications

instructions: Extract business insights, strategic implications, and actionable intelligence
Focus on business value and competitive advantage

Insight 2: Market intelligence with competitive relevance
Insight 3: Operational insight with practical applications
strategic_implications: Implication 1: How this affects business strategy
actionable_intelligence: Intelligence 1: Specific business opportunity or threat
Intelligence 2: Market trend with strategic relevance
Intelligence 3: Competitive insight with action potential

perspectives.role: You are an expert at multi-stakeholder business analysis.

scenario_analysis.mitigation: How to prevent or minimize impact

connections.role: You are an expert at identifying business connections and market implications.
instructions: Map connections to other business areas

business_connections.detailed_explanation: Specific ways these business areas interconnect

learning.role: You are an expert business strategist specializing in competitive intelligence.

strategic_gaps: Gap 1: Missing capability or knowledge with business impact

recommendations: Recommendation 1: Specific strategic action with expected outcome
Recommendation 2: Business initiative with measurable benefit

success_metrics: Metric 1: How to measure success of recommendations
